item.title: Maintaining a Multilingual CV in LaTeX
item.description: Lately I had to update my CV and stumbled on a little old problem. Being italian mothertongue I had two different version of my CV, one in italian and one in english. This made tedious making edits, mainly because each time that I’ve added a line on the file I realized there were other places where an update was needed. Remove a line here, move this section there, repeat for the other file.

item.title: The Bicycle Test
item.description: (A semi-serious movie test) TL;DR The Bicycle Test is passed by a movie if it satisfies one condition: there must exist at least one scene in which a named character rides a bike. Some time ago i discovered the Bechdel test, a test born as a joke about the representation of women in fiction. I’ve found it pretty terrifying, as even with those banal conditions lots of movies doesn’t pass it.
